channel.title: Omg help me!
channel.description:
tobbiasscape v6 v7 comeing soon
Ip---- 85.214.37.40
The thing that are gunna be added to the v7 server
Yes tobiasscape is back at the moment v6 is up but there will be a v7 up in a cuople more days some fetures
(Wether they work or not) "Plans for the future"
* Dig in graveyard to awaken zombies and skeletons, which auto attack! * Make an iron rock give you every ore at random + money. * A fun pking ring somewhere in lumbridge that you can mess about in. * Crystal keys and chest 100% working * Make p-king inside an actual dungeon, instead of the wilderness. * Make hammers and bowstrings break occassionally. * Cows in the sheep field * Upgrade fires just like real rs and let you cook off them? * Added more food cookable, e.g raw beef & raw chicken. * Furnace is in the house near Bob's axe shop in lumbridge, banks there also * Fishing spots are around the lumbridge bridge. * Fish sharks from the spot near the goblin house. * Tonnes of NPCs to train on, most with drops (will update) * Add god wars in the future. * Slayer will be in the lumbridge swamp in the future. * Flax can be picked across the river lum, and can be spun inside lumb castle. * Bones to give proper xp, and anvils will give less smithing xp also. * Many dungeons and quests filled with monsters. * Fires visible to other players * Lumbridge guide to give basic items & help? * Farming can be done by using a seed with a seed dibber anywhere to grow plants! * Removed maze minigame, adding demon minigame, the demons drop keys, which you get rewards for. * Proper runecrafting in the future * Proper price list coming soon * Removed teleporting crystals, added books. * Making good armour harder to get, e.g not in shops. * Moving all of the stalls to Draynor * Making fishing, smithing (dungeon), woodcutting + slayer (dungeon) spots in draynor. * Adding guards in and around draynor jail that auto attack you as you pass by * Adding full fletching in the future, no more shops, kill chickens chop trees etc. * Added two banks, which have different purposes, yet to be discovered :S * Adding new minigames such as goblin strike. * (Mabye) adding swimming... :s good luck! * Making most NPCs have dialogue. * Improved lagg condition and removed un-nessecary classes and handlers. * Now capable of holding over 300 players at a time. * Adding extra curtains to the north and south banks. * Will add arrow projectiles in future * Will try to fix dds spec so it faces opponent * Added NPC facing player * Removing following, because of NoClipping * May add chat box to play page
Here are some pics we have atm..
[img]http://www.tobiasscape.fusiveweb.co.uk/Portals/26904/b1.bmp[/img] [img]http://www.tobiasscape.fusiveweb.co.uk/Portals/26904/b2.bmp[/img] [IMG]http://i36.photobucket.com/albums/e23/MitejoeMite/tobby.png[/img] [IMG]http://i36.photobucket.com/albums/e23/MitejoeMite/tobby3.png[/img] [IMG]http://i36.photobucket.com/albums/e23/MitejoeMite/tobby7.png[/img] [IMG]http://i36.photobucket.com/albums/e23/MitejoeMite/tobias1.png[/img]
Have fun Join the server![br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 04, 2008, 03:04:20 am[/size][hr]help!!!!

item.title: Omg help me!
item.dc:creator: @imantai imantai
item.description:
@imantai wrote:

tobbiasscape v6 v7 comeing soon

Ip---- 85.214.37.40

The thing that are gunna be added to the v7 server

Yes tobiasscape is back at the moment v6 is up but there will be a v7 up in a cuople more days some fetures

(Wether they work or not) “Plans for the future”

* Dig in graveyard to awaken zombies and skeletons, which auto attack!
* Make an iron rock give you every ore at random + money.
* A fun pking ring somewhere in lumbridge that you can mess about in.
* Crystal keys and chest 100% working
* Make p-king inside an actual dungeon, instead of the wilderness.
* Make hammers and bowstrings break occassionally.
* Cows in the sheep field
* Upgrade fires just like real rs and let you cook off them?
* Added more food cookable, e.g raw beef & raw chicken.
* Furnace is in the house near Bob's axe shop in lumbridge, banks there also
* Fishing spots are around the lumbridge bridge.
* Fish sharks from the spot near the goblin house.
* Tonnes of NPCs to train on, most with drops (will update)
* Add god wars in the future.
* Slayer will be in the lumbridge swamp in the future.
* Flax can be picked across the river lum, and can be spun inside lumb castle.
* Bones to give proper xp, and anvils will give less smithing xp also.
* Many dungeons and quests filled with monsters.
* Fires visible to other players
* Lumbridge guide to give basic items & help?
* Farming can be done by using a seed with a seed dibber anywhere to grow plants!
* Removed maze minigame, adding demon minigame, the demons drop keys, which you get
  rewards for.
* Proper runecrafting in the future
* Proper price list coming soon
* Removed teleporting crystals, added books.
* Making good armour harder to get, e.g not in shops.
* Moving all of the stalls to Draynor
* Making fishing, smithing (dungeon), woodcutting + slayer (dungeon) spots in draynor.
* Adding guards in and around draynor jail that auto attack you as you pass by
* Adding full fletching in the future, no more shops, kill chickens chop trees etc.
* Added two banks, which have different purposes, yet to be discovered :S
* Adding new minigames such as goblin strike.
* (Mabye) adding swimming... :s good luck!
* Making most NPCs have dialogue.
* Improved lagg condition and removed un-nessecary classes and handlers.
* Now capable of holding over 300 players at a time.
* Adding extra curtains to the north and south banks.
* Will add arrow projectiles in future
* Will try to fix dds spec so it faces opponent
* Added NPC facing player
* Removing following, because of NoClipping
* May add chat box to play page

Here are some pics we have atm…






Have fun Join the server![br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 04, 2008, 03:04:20 am[/size][hr]help!!!

Read full topic
